channel.title: PI How to Question? (Disable Show Equipment Stats)
channel.description: Hey guys, I hate the show equipment stats because it's a little fucked up. LOL, i want to make it so when you click it, it doesn't pop up. Also, i'm gonna add sendMessage("This isn't avaliable due to problems"); err, yeah. :)

item.title: PI How to Question? (Disable Show Equipment Stats)
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Seems likes the interface isnt correct. Edit it and just add an piece

item.title: PI How to Question? (Disable Show Equipment Stats)
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“shank beast, post:4, topic:476931”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=595096.msg4190773#msg4190773 date=1356768191]
Ok this isn’t really hard.
Click ont he button of show equipment stats.
Now look in ur (client)run.bat and it will say something like this:

This #### is the number u need.
Open ur RSinterface.java (client sided) and search for that number and it will say something like this:

AddInterfaceButton(27651, 6, "Interfaces/Equipment/BOX", "More options", 27659, 1, 26, 33); addTooltip(27659, "Show donator options"); AddInterfaceButton(27653, 1, "Interfaces/Equipment/BOX", "Show Equipment Stats", 27655, 1, 40, 39); addTooltip(27655, "Show Equipment Stats"); AddInterfaceButton(27654, 2, "Interfaces/Equipment/BOX", "Xp Lock", 27657, 1, 40, 39); addTooltip(27657, "Locks your experiance.");

There you can just edit or remove things.
(But i suggest u try fix the equipment stat box since players will like to see their stats.)
[/quote]

Thanks both comments… uhm, it works but, it has see through spots and it’s annoyin!![/quote]

Huh how u mean?
Post a pic please

Read full topic
item.source: PI How to Question? (Disable Show Equipment Stats)

@shank_beast wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:2, topic:476931”]Ok this isn’t really hard.
Click ont he button of show equipment stats.
Now look in ur (client)run.bat and it will say something like this:

This #### is the number u need.
Open ur RSinterface.java (client sided) and search for that number and it will say something like this:

AddInterfaceButton(27651, 6, "Interfaces/Equipment/BOX", "More options", 27659, 1, 26, 33); addTooltip(27659, "Show donator options"); AddInterfaceButton(27653, 1, "Interfaces/Equipment/BOX", "Show Equipment Stats", 27655, 1, 40, 39); addTooltip(27655, "Show Equipment Stats"); AddInterfaceButton(27654, 2, "Interfaces/Equipment/BOX", "Xp Lock", 27657, 1, 40, 39); addTooltip(27657, "Locks your experiance.");

There you can just edit or remove things.
(But i suggest u try fix the equipment stat box since players will like to see their stats.)[/quote]

Thanks both comments… uhm, it works but, it has see through spots and it’s annoyin!!
